sentences: Work with back-end development and server-side engineering
Design and architect features that will be used by millions of people on release

Exposure to Machine Learning (Tensorflow) will be a plus technical SkillsLearn the technology area where you are going to work expert with at least one programming language, and very good with many others
Know Python and Django very well
Great understanding of software design principles
Very experienced with web application deployment and software design principles
Experience working with various data stores such as PostgreSQL, Redis; also distributed databases such as Cassandra
Minimum Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science, Electrical Engineering, or related field
